LanguageData.Apparel_FlakJacket.label: Suit jacket
LanguageData.Apparel_FlakJacket.description: A fancy suit jacket that can be worn on top of a shirt. You can look your best at any time of the day in a suit!
LanguageData.Apparello_Meditux.label: Doctor's Brocade
LanguageData.Apparello_Meditux.description: To always keep calm and collected, wear brocade. The definite go to piece of apparel for any gentleguy or gal, now in doctor's edition. All of the doctors wearing these know how to talk to their patients or at the very least give the impression that they'd know what the heck they are doing.
LanguageData.Apparel_FSChefJacket.label: Chef jacket
